comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): The issue highlights a critical usability problem ('evil' behavior) with detachable panels, which likely stems from the implementation of the WeifenLuo.WinFormsUI.Docking library.
Approach: Investigate the usage and configuration of WeifenLuo.WinFormsUI.Docking, focusing on panel lifecycle, serialization/deserialization, and user interaction patterns that lead to reported 'evil' behavior. Identify specific scenarios where panels misbehave and implement fixes or refactor the docking logic to improve stability and user experience.
